#summary Version history

= *2012-03-11* Release 2 =

 * Save/Load of system state
 * Configuration files with support of multiple sequential simulations
 * Optimization of texture size for given number of ions
 * Plutonium dioxide pair potentials
 * Creation of octahedral crystals
 * Mean square displacement calculation for bulk and surface ions

= *2012-02-23* The first public release =

Simple version demonstrating fast GPU computation of pair forces and energy in uranium dioxide cubic nanocrystals. Integration is carries out on CPU, which takes significant amount of time on small systems. Parameters of GPU computation are optimal on AMD Radeon 6970 graphics card.
